name: Neon Nightfire
description:
In Neon Nightfire, you're in a nightclub-esque environment where you have to bust enemies with your laser weapon and collect as many green orbs as you can (they don't do anything, you just collect them to increase your final score.) Although, when you die from getting hit by too many enemies, you respawn where you first started, and you lose 30% of the total amount of orbs you collected.

Also, this game was made for the Brackey's Game Jam 2023.1, with the theme 'An End is a New Beginning'.

Controls

Move: WASD

Look: Mouse

Fire: Left-Click
